author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENA EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL VERY SOON... ...MOST IMPORTANTLY, THE RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SONORA THROUGH FRIDAY...
summary: ...LORENA EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL VERY SOON... ...MOST IMPORTANTLY, THE RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SONORA THROUGH FRIDAY... As of 8:00 PM PDT Thu Sep 04 the center of Lorena was located near 24.6, -115.1 with movement NW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
